attributes.action: Stop Tesco's expansion in the UK and unfair tactics used against it's rivals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
'Tesco now controls 30% of the grocery market in the UK. In 2007, the supermarket chain announced over £2.5 billion in profits. Growing evidence indicates that Tesco's success is partly based on trading practices that are having serious consequences for suppliers, farmers and workers worldwide, local shops and the environment' (Taken from: http://www.tescopoly.org) 

Tesco is using unfair tactics in order to expand and consume more of the market, putting rivals out of business.
